content.detailedDescription:
I was in my hot tub in my backyard.
i was starring at the big dipper when object appeared.
my first thought was fear due to it disapearing in the cloud above me, and trying to determine what i had seen.
the object appeared travel way faster then any aircraft and was very blurry and moonlight cloud coloured with no defined shape. the motion was sporadic, spider or crab like. it's as if it was accelerating and stopping instantly repeating this while maintaining a very high speed until it vanished in the cloud.
content.summary: Large blurry cloud like ufo scurrying into cloud travelling fast but at the same time appeared to be glitchang.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife is a amateur photographer. she was at the wind and sea beach in la jolla ca taking sunset pictures. my wife was taking these pictures with 2-4 second exposures. i thought it was odd that the lights and image did not move during the exposure. my wife took three pictures of the seen over a 10 min time period. these 3 photos are very clear. she used a cannon d70 camera on a tripod with remote. i am not sure these are ufo pictures but the object appears to move very slow and also seems to be rotating by the way the lights have changed position from the three pictures. please contact me after you look them over. 

thanks,
[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: My wife found these images in her photos.

content.detailedDescription: After a storm had passed, was taking photos of a rainbow. down the street i noticed an odd red shaft of light, so i took a couple of photos. was surprised to find a cocoon of light within the red shaft by applying red filtering.
content.summary: Red rainbow

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard about to get into the spa when i looked up to the sky and observed a triangular object with lights at each point and what seemed to be a shadowy body in the triangle. the object was moving as i looked up. it was moving very fast from north to south. there was no sound from the object. i lost sight of the object as it moved over the roof of my home.  felt it was quite low down, not as high up as a plane but a fair height above the surrounding trees. the sky was clear and quite starry. i did not observe any other movement in the sky for the hour after the sighting. after the sighting i felt goosebumps on my skin and quite confused as to what i saw. i am still trying to justify what i saw.
content.summary: Observed triangular shaped object with obscured lights at each corner travelling very fast in a southerly direction  at a low altitude

content.detailedDescription: In 2008 i took my new 1080p video camera outside to film the clouds moving by on what was a slightly breezy day.I placed the camera on a tripod aimed it up at the clouds and set camera zoom out to its maximum and started recording.What i filmed is probably the best ufo footage i have ever seen. you see the clouds in the video and soon you start seeing white dots flying in and out of the clouds,at first there's one or two dots, later you see more dots flying around. these dots flying like they did reminded me of how squirrel's  play and chase each other.The best part clearly shows intelligence, one dot stops flying comes to a halt and a second later the dot makes a b line starts flying away from where it was hovering, that's when you see what looks like ether a missile or meteorite headed to where that dot was hovering at. it explodes, rite were that dot was at. i filmed this in 2008, i still have the video camera too.
content.summary: Several white dots up high in the sky cloud level flying around during daylight hour 2pm.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of my bathroom window which around 9:30 on march 26th 2015 when i noticed a large glowing sphere hovering over in the sky which i at first sight i thought might be a star but then i saw it move a bit so i went and got my girlfriend to take a look. she saw the same slight hovering that i did. i then went to my front porch and took a video and pictures of the sphere with my cell phone. the pictures were interesting in that there was some intereference in many of the shots which showed up in a pattern. i was able to zoom in and take a picture without the intereference if i didn't focus the camera on it but if i zoomed out the interference was in the same basic pattern. the object never moved much while i watched it but when i checked on it 15 minutes later and it had moved positions in the sky. it was much farther west and looked as if it had moved north as well. the next time i checked on it at least 45 minutes after the initial sighting i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Saw a glowing orb that was brighter than any star and was hovering in one general spot. about 10 minutes later it had changed positions and later it was gone.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 4/6/15 at 11:45 to 11:55p.M.Us eastern time went to the kitchen when i notice very bright red lights suspended in the night sky extremely bright as if they were l.E.D's lighting but so much larger, as it stood suspended in sky the object seem to dim out with a single low pinkish light as if it knew i was watching it then to my surprise it emanated a bright blue into a green within 10 to 15 minutes per say and started to crews away nw, what i like to know is that particular night were there any other witnesses reason being i live near a very busy airport wondering if they received any radar intel because the object was quite large,silent, and pretty close in air space/airport, have a couple of photos on a cell phone and very short video would i like to submit? gosh, was so excited but in same fold scared...
content.summary: Seen on the side of my peripheral vision such bright colorful lights till it coasted away...

content.detailedDescription:
i am a believer we are not alone.  i sometimes scan the reality shows
 when they show the mid night horizon looking ufo.  i  saw a
 flash of light on a show and thought it might be of interest.  i
 slowed the show down to slow mo and it is a clear image of a
 rod flying through the sky.  it has multiple frames that i
 could see the exact match to wing rods seen in mexico cave.  the
 rod not only flys into view at extreme speed but starts to
 curve/ change direction.  very fast!!!  i thought you would like to know.  it is from a very popular show on tv from this last week episde. 
 appalachian outlaws, episode 9, min 11.  must see!!!  if its
 not available online, i can send pic.
content.summary: Wing rods seen in appalachia same as rods in mexico cave

content.detailedDescription: It was the weekend, and saw it out of the kitchen window with my dad.My dad named: bill sr., called me over to see it.I'm a star wars fan,so it was awesome to see.Well,the first craft was like, hovering in the sky for a long time, and shot straight up into the sky, and took off. the second, moved from left to rightand went hyperspeed to the right and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Family of four sees to ufos outside kitchen window.

content.detailedDescription: I have many pictures over the last couple of years and video here lately of the ufo working in the clouds there is something really big that is colorful out there that they are blocking our view. the big one takes about 6-8 hours to go from horizon to horizon. i have had these sore off and on for years. this last year they have been continous. my legs, chest, gentail area, ears, and head are scared. pain in my head. anyway started paying attention, last wed. i lost an hour. i woke up thursday morning with marks on my and then the bruise 3 days later. here is a pic of leg. am i being abducted. i'm a 50 year old women who is highly educated and not crazy in anyway. i went thourgh my memories and wow but this last year has been way different
content.summary: Ufo's in cloud working to block our view and abduction

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on il rt 1in the north part of rossville il. i was a passenger. it was a a diamond shaped craft hovering over a cornfield with many solid white lights. it reminded me of a christmas ornament. the exact dates and times are approximate. i saw it hovering motionless for about 5 minutes then we lost sight of it due to moving forward down the road. i did not feel anything different nor did we experience anything out of the ordinary. it could have been something government related, but i don't know as there is no military facilities in the area. it looked to be about 200 ft in the air and about 30 ft wide and 50 ft tall. again this is only an approximation as there was nothing really else in the sky to provide perspective. i did not see it land nor did i see anything come out or in the craft. it just hovered motionless. please contact me with further questions.
content.summary: Traveling south on il rt 1 saw diamond shape craft hovering in sky over cornfield in north rossville il

content.detailedDescription: I sent i picture last week. you guys called me on easter in the eve. i was looking for some pictures i took the same day and fond this one. never thought much about it till i noticed the rectangular object in the upper right corner.
content.summary: Picture

content.detailedDescription: My wife was on the dock of the little satilla river taking pics of the sunset. we later was looking at the photos when i noticed the orb. we have four photos which show the orb mo.Ving across the river away from her to the other side then acending into the sky. i have seen with my eyes a similar or same orb coming over our house right at dark.  moving very quickly with my dog chaseing it. it was bright orb of light about the size of a basketball.
content.summary: Appeared in four photos my wife took. did not see it untill we looked at photos

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:00pm, i went outside to get something out of my car. it was a clear night and i always look up at the sky. i looked up and saw a white ball. when i first saw it, it looked like a snow globe. then it changed to orange, red and yellow in color. i had my cellphone in my pocket so i took it out and started recording it. the object was just hovering slowly to the north. if you look closely near the end of the video, you can see a airplane's light blinking and i think you can see some stars.
content.summary: Went to my car to get something and looked up and i saw a white ball then it changed colors

content.detailedDescription: Ufo are nothing new in ark.They visit every so often this is only one incident. just like the lights in arizona but then became horizontal. anyone can see them if you know how and where to look. also they can come toward you and disappear in front of you and take on a hologram of different aircraft.Have amazing video,but somethings are suppose to be hidden.
content.summary: Ufo are nothing new in ark. they visit every so often this is only one incident. just like the lights in arizona but then became horizonal. please do not contact me just sharing love all

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple red objects seen on saturday, 4-4-15 –
at approximately 8:20 pm we were in front of my home with a relative from new york. we were looking at the rising moon in the east and noticed how clear and warm it was in comparison to the previous weekends.  we first saw a group of 13 red objects coming from the north west and they appeared to be flying in several formations. the first few flew in a configuration that looked like the constellation sagittarius with two vertical v shaped formations of 3 objects following this constellation resembling formation.

since we live in the landing patterns for philadelphia international airport we are quite familiar with the heights, speeds and sounds of approaching, circling and departing aircraft. we also are in one of the approaches to willow grove naval air station, so we see military aircraft every so often.

there were no sounds associated with these objects and they seemed to fly past us at about 4-6k ft at about 400 mph. about twice the speed we would normally see landing aircraft and about the height you would anticipate a plane to be landing at pia. the objects were about twice the size of a passenger jet at this height. they all seemed to be identical. my cousin seemed to think they were v shaped but all i saw was an oval red light.

the objects were bright red in all the groups. the second group followed the first after an interval of about 10 seconds. they were heading on the same course, northwest to southeast toward the rising full moon. 

the second group was a group of 9 objects flying almost at the same heights and speed as the first group. i had my cell phone and began taking video and stills. surprising but the video did not capture the objects but my stills did. 

the second group flew with the first 6 objects flying in a half moon shape followed by 3 in a vertical line. at this point i called my wife outside and she did not know what to make out of them.
 
when we thought they were gone another group of 3 following the same course, height and speed flew by, followed by another group of 3, then a few seconds later another group of 3. all were red and all followed the same course. these were flying in a triangle, isosceles, with the two creating the base flying east and one tailing the other two. as they flew towards the rising moon they all disappeared climbing out of site, as they flew east. however, they all were climbing through the area of our vision, but seemed to be starting at a lower altitude from the west and climbing going east until they faded out of view.
we have never seen anything like this especially with no associated sounds or flashing lights.

someone else had to see these with the amount of objects in the sky.
we had never seen anything like this and are interested if anyone saw this as there were so many of them and seemed to all be following each other.

we look forward to hearing if anyone else saw these. these were taken with a droid razor m.
content.summary: Over 30 objects in several successive groups following similar course and altitude. all red with no sound within 2 to 4k feet of witnesses

content.detailedDescription: On april 6th 2015 7.50pm taunton ma.Going into my car in my driveway, on my cell phone . weather was cool, cloudless clear sky,only 2 faint jet vapor trails in direction of my view.I observed aprox 45 to 50degrees above horizon 2 red starlike objects no flashing, steady light! , aprox brightness mag.-1.5 moving ne to nw in a line aprox 5 to 8 degrees apart. rate of speed slow moving. observed time moved 15 to 20 degrees in aprox 15sec. than 2nd object , as if on dimmer switch was turned down, was gone! aprox 5sec. later 1st. object did same! told person on cell you will not beleve what i just saw! metor perhaps? no way! aprox 15sec. aft2nd was gone, from same direction as first observed, a yellow orange light appeared w/ same characteristics as other 2 . followed same flight path for aprox 10sec and vanished in same area in same manner! wow!!!
content.summary: In driveway 2 red starlike aprox -1.5mag. moving very slow 2nd faded like a dimmer switch 1st did same. then 3rd yellow-orange appeared followed same did same

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-35 towards oklahoma city. i was already in moore and going towards norman when i saw this white cylinder moving too fast to be a plane and too slow for a rocket. after having over 200 sighting since 2010 i know how celestial crafts move. it was white with a bump in the center of it.
content.summary: Cylinder moving at rapid pace east to west in oklahoma

content.detailedDescription: At 4:20 pm nov. 20 2014 i was waiting out in drive at my reclusive home for wife to come home from work.  yellow light traveling west, slowly and low, then changed course to south towards me, still slow. object came to within 50 yards of me, 75 yards high then wife's car hit gravel road to our home, light shot up at tremendous speed, flashing like a strobe, climbed to approx. 1,500 feet in less than one and 1/2 second.  went black, turned light out.  called to wife to come look at it (she did) we both spotted it.  then in the shape of saucer, the disc drifted down in a leaf like pattern, falling slowly.  we watched it for about 3 minutes doing this, it was a dull silver saucer with a black dome, approx. 25 feet around.  it drifted towards ground behind tree at a gravel pit behind me home.  appeared to land as it was no more than twenty feet above ground when we last saw it.  we guessed from position that it landed in willow lake (a large pond) at the gravel pit, an area we know well.  wife and i and 2 other people went back to the pond to look.  water in pond was steaming even though the temperature was about 34 degrees and night now falling.  have drawings of event.  contact me
content.summary: Slow moving yellow light at 90 yards height, changed course to me, shot up in flash changed to saucer shaped disc with dome then landed in gravel pit

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home around the last week of march , and while turning onto my street i witnessed a bright glowing white orb descend into the the tree line slowly . i drove around the circle  towards the far side where it appeared to have descended and did not see anything. i walked into my house and told my wife about it.
  
 she told me she had come in from taking our dog out not long before i arrived home and had seen the same as i did out of the corner of her eyes but had seen it twice within a very short period of time. this was about 15-20 minutes before i had pulled onto our street. it startled her enough to hurry back to the house.

 i have seen plenty of falling stars and meteors in my life, but have never seen one go straight down at a low rate of speed like this seemed to do. in the last couple months there seems to be some helicopter traffic which is the first year i have heard so much in my area.

  we are close to the old griffis afb which has some drone testing companies based there currently. also there is a small airport (oneida county airport) in the area. planes are not unusual to hear flying overhead, or the occasional police helicopter or even air traffic from fort drum in the north, but i have never seen anything like this and i grew up around air force bases as my father is retired air force.
content.summary: Saw  white , glowing orb decend into the tree line in the distance

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1130 am on april 7 , 2015, i saw a buzzard circling, hovering my parents house while i was on vacation visiting in millsboro, de. as i was watching the buzzard i noticed two cigar shaped objects fly over head well above the buzzard. smaller cigar shapped object was in front of larger shaped cigar like object flying in a straight formation. i was trying to figure out what they were, because i never saw anything like them before. they were silvery white, with few hints of grey. they did not have wings and were silent ! leaving no trail of any kind. they moved over head in about 15 seconds and they flew out of site. it was a clear bright day and no clouds near objects.
content.summary: Saw two cigar  shapped  objects

content.detailedDescription: Object(s) with three lights seen at about 8:50pm on easter sunday hovering southwest of my vantage point. the silent objects glided eastward and looked like orange fireballs. they flashed erratically and then disappeared one by one.
content.summary: Triangular objecthovering shifting shape dissapearing

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking, looking up at the stars, this thing came over the house silent, the red and., white light is what i noticed...I struggled to keep my eyes on i because it was fast.....But the way it moved was stuck out to me ..Slightly...Dipping and kind of weaving it's way thru ' the sky....But it was really going fast.....It was.......Unnatural
content.summary: Crossed the entire sky in less than two second.....It moved..Slight bobs and weaves...Really strange

content.detailedDescription: I was riding on the leave and looked over in the wheat field and noticed the impressions in the field. the impressions seem uniform across 500 acres.
content.summary: Crop circles in louisiana wheat field.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the fish and chip shop to buy my tea at around 20:30 i looked up as i was walking into the shop after exiting the car i had arrived in, when i first seen the objects i thought they were geese flying over. but when seeing them move so fast down and then back up again i thought that was impossible for any bird to glide down that fast and back up again. i shouted to my friend who thought i was pointing at something else who did not see the ufo's, but with a thew seconds they had gone, they seem to have just vanished as they glided back up.
content.summary: I saw the several objects for around 30 seconds to 1 minute making quick maneuvers then just vanishing into thin air

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a business  trip to china  from south africa, we arrived in a small group to hong kong via o.R.Thambo air port in jhb south africa. we flew from hong kong to shanghai , on arrival we drove from are port to the city , we stopped at a few sites to view , then arrived around 5-6pm outside the oriental pearl tower. i was cloudy and was raining somewhat, but cloud was not too low, we could clearly see the tower, i took many pictures around the tower with the group and the attached photo was taken just before we entered the tower.
when i took the picture , my attention was drawn to a light on the r/h side , but after taking the photo i could not see anything , thus did not worry further , some time later i was checking the pictures i took and noticed the light , however it was not until much later when returning back to south africa , , after loading all pictures on my lap top , that i was intrigued by this picture i took.
i have no explanation what is was , but when i took the picture it was there , and next thing gone !
the city was very busy , i was excited and did not pursue the subject.
over the last year this photo has been on my mind and i would like to understand if any , is there a reasonable explanation for it? 
i do believe that we are being visited , and some how , i may have witnessed , even though very small , something unidentified.

i do not believe anyone else in our small group say what i saw , but i did not discuss it with anyone else anyway.

regards
content.summary: Unknown object photographed in the sky while visiting shanghai china’s oriental pearl tower..

content.detailedDescription: Saw a ufo over my house, near downtown cincinnati, ohio at approx 9:50pm on monday, april 1 2015. it looked like a giant soup can, glowing blue-white, moving quickly across the sky like a meteor, but much bigger. i looked up and saw it sail across the sky, for maybe 1 second. i didn't think it could be a meteor, because it was a cloudy night. my neighbor was outside at the same time, and i'm going to ask her if she saw anything too.
content.summary: A large streak of light flashed across the sky, like a meteor falling

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing at the rear conservatory door which faces due north having let my dog out for the evening. i looked up and saw two red constant unblinking noiseless lights moving across the night time sky from west to east around 25 degrees from the horizon below the cloud cover and not obscured by any other cloud formation at any time in a perfectly straight line with no wind present at ground level.

sky was 100 per cent high cloud cover with no celestial objects in view and no other aircraft in the vicinity.The leading light was about two to three degrees lower then the trailing light with the distance between them remaining constant during the observation which was around one minute until they went out of view behind tree cover.

i always have my 10x50 binoculars close to the conservatory door and used these to focus on each light source, this gave a single strong red light with a 'halo' effect surrounding it but no outline of any craft could be seen via the light.

on eye view again the source was still constant and red but was that of a fuzzy ball effect. my first thought was that of two military helicopters travelling in tandem formation but i could hear no rotor or engine noise during the sighting and kept listening for another minute after they had gone from my sight to be absolutely sure as night time noise does travel much farther but still heard nothing.

the two light sources intruige me as there were absolutely no anti collision lights seen with each of the red lights which i would expect to see on any civilian or military aircraft travelling on night flights. 

our location places us equidistant ( 50 miles ) of both heathrow (london ) and birmingham international airports with aircraft travelling at different altitudes for both approach and holding patterns, we did have a very active usaf base at one time close by with the military jets travelling at low altitudes and all points of the compass on their approach and holding patterns and at no time during day or night did i see any of these aircraft especially at night travel without all of the anti collision lights in full use.

my primary thought is of military helicopters due to the relatively slow movement of the lights but even military helicopters on night time engagement use the anti collision lights especially in an area with heavy civilian presence of other aircraft and overflying of populated areas.

after the event i was not affected by this sighting but was puzzled by seeing only red light sources from aerial craft and the complete absence of any noise during my observing of them and for the time after they had gone from view and still hearing nothing to indicate if it was a helicopter or fixed wing craft
content.summary: Two red lights only seen travelling in straight path from west to east with no sound heard

content.detailedDescription:
[links moved to fi section/cms/tg]

i film as close as i can part 1 and 2 for proof of today

my mother been telling me that is following her for 4 days now which i didnt believe i think she crazy she said it follows from work to home and she saw it closer it strange it appear when she was leaving to work today.

i first thought i was a star but i look higher and i saw bunch of stars and for sure that bright light wasn't a star was something else and it wasn't a plane ether it just stayed still and in an hour and few minutes it disappear and my mother said she got to work and she says its there now i told her is not over here anymore.
content.summary: Ufo strange lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom were walking on a path by the water when i spotted a blue light moving slowly over us i thought it was a plane at first but it made no sound and had no blinking lights it was all blue it lasted for about 5 mins i feel like this has effected me emotional and i've never seen anything like it it wasn't as high as a plane either
content.summary: Blue light by the ocean
